properties.name: app.jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret key for JWT token signing. Must be long enough for HS256 algorithm.

properties.name: app.jwt.expiration
properties.description: JWT token expiration time in milliseconds.

properties.name: app.jwt.refresh-expiration
properties.description: JWT refresh token expiration time in milliseconds.

properties.name: app.totp.issuer
properties.description: TOTP issuer name displayed in authenticator apps.

properties.name: app.totp.digits
properties.description: Number of digits in TOTP codes.

properties.name: app.oauth2.redirect-uri
properties.description: OAuth2 redirect URI for authorization callbacks.

properties.name: app.admin.default-username
properties.description: Default admin username created on application startup.

properties.name: app.admin.default-password
properties.description: Default admin password created on application startup.

properties.name: app.admin.default-email
properties.description: Default admin email created on application startup.
